config.mogumogu.title: Mogumogu Mod Settings
config.mogumogu.enabled.tooltip: Toggle automatic eating when hunger is low
config.mogumogu.hunger_threshold.tooltip: Automatically eat food when hunger is at or below this value (0-20)
config.mogumogu.blacklist.tooltip: List of items that will not be eaten automatically (e.g., minecraft:rotten_flesh)
config.mogumogu.blacklist.item.tooltip: Set whether to automatically eat %s (check to not eat)
config.mogumogu.blacklist.title: Food Blacklist Settings
config.mogumogu.blacklist.help: Click to allow/deny automatic use of food
config.mogumogu.blacklist.description: Configure foods that won't be eaten automatically
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.mogumogu: A client-side mod that automatically eats food when hunger drops below a threshold
config.mogumogu.eat_while_action.tooltip: Allows automatic eating even while performing other actions like sprinting
